title: What double VGU would you want to see if they do another one
body:
I would want the Icathian boys to get one 
VgU{{champion:24}} VGU{{champion:26}}

My second choice would be 
VGU{{champion:106}} and VgU{{champion:34}}.

replies.body: {{champion:38}} and {{champion:90}} sounds like the most exciting to me, but I'd also like to see {{champion:131}} and {{champion:89}} , especially since it would be an excuse to finally update Leona's splash.

Diana/Leona are a possible double update, with Diana receiving an Aatrox level update and Leona receiving mostly visual work.

I'd expect Voli in particular to be a standalone as Anivia is not in a bad spot (she could do with an Ezreal scale visual update).

> [{quoted}](name=FurorDivinus27,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ar6AOA40,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-09-20T16:58:35.261+0000)
>
> {{champion:7}} /{{champion:82}}

This is a very good idea.

> [{quoted}](name=Rowanstar,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ar6AOA40,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2018-11-11T02:39:53.348+0000)
>
> Mordekaiser and Mordekaiser

[This is getting out of hand, now there are two of them!](https://i.redd.it/xx15qygvpb701.jpg)
You got that mixed up. Zilean and Volibear for REASONS.

{{champion:17}} and {{champion:45}}
or
{{champion:9}} and {{champion:35}} 

Everyone here could use a varying degree of VGU.

Teemo needs a visual update and his W is rather lackluster as an ability. His Q is also a little dated.
Veigar needs a visual update mainly, and I feel like his W could be spiced up a bit. R might need some frustration parts changed from it.
Fiddlesticks needs a lot of everything and more.
Shaco same as Fiddlesticks.

{{champion:42}} 

Not a single champion needs a vgu more
I hope Jax gets only a VU. He's perfect how he is
if its a VGU it'd be like Xin Zhao, not much would be different but things would be slightly more in tune with the current quality present day powers are like,
